entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: The head of the government, mentioned in the conversation between Fudge and the Prime Minister. (Excerpt: 'He was, after all, the Prime Minister...')

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: A person who visits the Prime Minister regularly, known for his stern behavior. (Excerpts: 'Fudge fixed the Prime Minister with a rather stern look.', 'He was, after all, the Prime Minister...')

entities.name: west country
entities.description: A region mentioned as having some sort of ruckus. (Excerpt: 'the ruckus in the West Country...')

relationships.description: Fudge visits the Prime Minister regularly, as mentioned in the conversation. (Excerpt: 'It was precisely this sort of behaviour that made him dislike Fudge’s visits so much.')
